question: 有哪些接口可以获取曲面参数范围？
llama-8b: There are several interfaces that can be used to get the range of surface parameters.

question: 如何根据参数获取曲面上某点的坐标？
llama-8b: You can use the "Point" command in the "Surface" toolbox to get the coordinates of a point on a surface.

question: 如何根据参数获取曲面上某点的法向？
llama-8b: To get the normal of a point on a surface, you can use the following method: 1. Select the surface. 2. Right-click and select "Surface" > "Get Normal". 3. In the "Get Normal" dialog box, select the point on the surface. 4. The normal of the point will be displayed in the "Normal" field.

question: 有哪些接口可以获取全部造型？
llama-8b: You can get all the shapes by using the following interfaces: GetAllShapes, GetShapes, GetShape, GetShapeList, GetShapeList2.

question: 选择孔特征的接口是什么？
llama-8b: The interface of the hole feature is the hole center.

question: 如何获取零件属性？
llama-8b: To get the properties of a part, you can use the "Get Properties" command.

question: 中望3D的API有什么接口能拿到模型的所有实体ID吗？
llama-8b: Yes, you can get all entity IDs of a model in ZWCAD API.

question: 如何把一个造型分为多个造型？
llama-8b: To divide a shape into multiple shapes, you can use the "Split" command.
